channel.title: How do I make varrock a pkzone again and fix ice barrage?
channel.description: in the Total War source, varrock isn't a pkzone, how do I change that and everytime someone barrages they get banned, how can I fix that too?

item.title: How do I make varrock a pkzone again and fix ice barrage?
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

I think for fixing icebarrage you need to search like this : // ice barrage level 94 spell ,

Then post your code here.

Read full topic
